title: Bugsplat=dodge queue?
body: All right, i've had this issue a few times and so have my friends. We get bug-splats and then Riot systems is all like "Ohh he dodged, lets give him a 15 minute wait penalty. Yeah, that is bad. Especially when i am streaming, like well. Looks like we have to wait 15 mins cause spaghetti code. This is actually so enraging. Anyone else have this issue? {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Have you tried [trouble shooting ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)the issue? If you can't find what you're looking for there you can try sending in a support ticket to Riot. 

It might be worth a shot if you are experiencing this frequently.
